member.name: T:NmeaParser.BufferedStreamDevice
member.summary: An abstract generic NMEA device that reads a stream at a decreased pace, mostly used to emulate NMEA input from files and strings.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:NmeaParser.Nmea.Glonass.Glgns
member.summary: Fix data for GLONASS satellite navigation systems

member.name: T:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns
member.summary: Fixes data for single or combined (GPS, GLONASS, possible future satellite systems, and systems combining these) satellite navigation systems

member.name: F:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.Mode.NoFix
member.summary: No fix. Satellite system not used in position fix, or fix not valid

member.name: F:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.Mode.Autonomous
member.summary: Autonomous. Satellite system used in non-differential mode in position fix

member.name: F:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.Mode.Differential
member.summary: Differential (including all OmniSTAR services). Satellite system used in differential mode in position fix

member.name: F:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.Mode.Precise
member.summary: Precise. Satellite system used in precision mode. Precision mode is defined as no deliberate degradation (such as Selective Availability) and higher resolution code (P-code) is used to compute position fix.

member.name: F:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.Mode.RealTimeKinematic
member.summary: Real Time Kinematic. Satellite system used in RTK mode with fixed integers

member.name: F:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.Mode.FloatRtk
member.summary: Float RTK. Satellite system used in real time kinematic mode with floating integers

member.name: M:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.OnLoadMessage(System.String[])
member.summary: Called when the message is being loaded.

member.name: P:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.FixTime
member.summary: Time of day fix was taken

member.name: P:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.Hdop
member.summary: Horizontal Dilution of Precision (HDOP), calculated using all the satellites (GPS, GLONASS, and any future satellites) used in computing the solution reported in each GNS sentence.

member.name: P:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.GeoidalSeparation
member.summary:
Geoidal separation in meters - the difference between the earth ellipsoid surface and mean-sea-level (geoid) surface defined by the reference datum used in the position solution
'-' = mean-sea-level surface below ellipsoid.

member.name: P:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.TimeSinceLastDgpsUpdate
member.summary: Age of differential data - if talker ID is GN, additional GNS messages follow with GP and/or GL Age of differential data

member.name: P:NmeaParser.Nmea.Gns.DgpsStationId
member.summary: eference station ID1, range 0000-4095 - Null if talker ID is GN, additional GNS messages follow with GP and/or GL Reference station ID
